short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uwall is a global company with a mission to democratize access to the Web3

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web3 for everyone!
Uwall is your everyday crypto wallet. All the benefits of web3 in one place and easy to use.
We are the key that allows you to enter the fun of web3. Games, music, metaverses, concerts, restaurants, events, tickets, investments, and much more!

*Send, receive and store tokens: Manage your tokens how you want, where you want and when you want.
*Multi-chain: More chains, more tokens, simpler!
*Owner of your data: Only you have access to your information. You decide what to make public and what private.
*Low Cost: We work on Polygon, have fun at a low cost. We want everything to be easier, faster and free.
*Without custody: Uwall owns nothing of yours. You own the crypto assets and information inside your wallet
*Customize your wallet: Soon our wallet address will be our identity on the internet. we should be pretty!
